00008 const int GameControlEngine::RunEngine()
00009 {
00010         Initialize();
00011 
00012         GameLoop();
00013 
00014         // NOTE: return 0 automatically calls ~GameControlEngine() which calls Destroy()
00015         // This results in a crash on the second run through when trying to access/delete data already deleted
00016         //Destroy();
00017 
00018         return 0;
00019 }

00021 void GameControlEngine::Initialize()
00022 {
00023         // Initialize from script
00024         ScriptManager::Instance().LoadWindowInitLua(ScreenWidth, ScreenHeight, screenTitle, fullScreen);
00025         ScriptManager::Instance().LoadCamInitLua(
00026                 m_camera->GetPosition(), 
00027                 m_camera->GetYaw(), 
00028                 m_camera->GetPitch(), 
00029                 m_camera->GetFov(), 
00030                 m_camera->GetNearPlane(), 
00031                 m_camera->GetFarPlane());
00032         ScriptManager::Instance().LoadModelsInitLua(m_allModelsData, m_modelsData);
00033         ScriptManager::Instance().LoadHeightmapsInitLua(m_allHeightmapsData, m_heightmapsData);
00034 
00035         // Exit if error creating window
00036         if (!m_windowManager || m_windowManager->Initialize(ScreenWidth, ScreenHeight, screenTitle, fullScreen) != 0)
00037                 exit(-1);
00038 
00039         // Create viewport
00040         glViewport(0, 0, ScreenWidth, ScreenHeight);
00041 
00042         // Enable depth testing
00043         glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00044         glDepthFunc(GL_LESS);
00045 
00046         // Initialize gameworld
00047         m_gameWorld = new GameWorld();
00048 
00049         // Initialize camera perspective and position
00050         m_camera->SetPerspective(glm::radians(m_camera->GetFov()), ScreenWidth / (float)ScreenHeight, m_camera->GetNearPlane(), m_camera->GetFarPlane());
00051         m_camera->PositionCamera(m_camera->GetPosition().x, m_camera->GetPosition().y, m_camera->GetPosition().z, m_camera->GetYaw(), glm::radians(m_camera->GetPitch()));
00052 
00053         // Create new player
00054         player = new Player("Player");
00055 
00056         /**********************************Loading of all heightfields at once**************************************/
00057         // Get iterator to start of heightfields map
00058         std::unordered_map<std::string, HeightmapsData>::iterator itHeightfields = m_allHeightmapsData.begin();
00059         
00060         // BruteForce variable
00061         Bruteforce* bfHeightfield;
00062 
00063         // Initialize all heightfields in map
00064         while (itHeightfields != m_allHeightmapsData.end())
00065         {
00066                 // Create new BruteForce
00067                 bfHeightfield = new Bruteforce((*itHeightfields).second.modelScales[0], (*itHeightfields).second.modelScales[1], (*itHeightfields).second.modelScales[2]);
00068                 
00069                 // Initialize data from map and push to terrains vector
00070                 bfHeightfield->LoadHeightfield((*itHeightfields).second.filePath, (*itHeightfields).second.fileSize);
00071                 bfHeightfield->GenerateTerrain(TextureManager::Instance().GetTextureID((*itHeightfields).second.texFilePath), (*itHeightfields).second.texFilePath);
00072                 bfHeightfield->SetPosition(glm::vec3((*itHeightfields).second.modelPositions[0], (*itHeightfields).second.modelPositions[1], (*itHeightfields).second.modelPositions[2]));
00073                 m_terrains.push_back(bfHeightfield);
00074                 
00075                 // Move camera to be on top of terrain 
00076                 if ((*itHeightfields).first == "terrain")
00077                 {
00078                         //m_camera->SetPosition(glm::vec3(m_camera->GetPosition().x, bfHeightfield->GetAverageHeight(m_camera->GetPosition().x, m_camera->GetPosition().z), m_camera->GetPosition().z));
00079                 }
00080 
00081                 // Increment iterator
00082                 itHeightfields++;
00083         }
00084         /**********************************Loading of all heightfields at once**************************************/
00085                 
00086         // Pass camera into gameworld
00087         m_gameWorld->SetCamera(m_camera);
00088 
00089         // Initialize asset factory
00090         m_assetFactory = new GameAssetFactory();
00091 
00092         // Initialize physics engine
00093         m_physicsWorld = new PhysicsEngine();
00094 
00095         /*
00096                 When creating .raw files in Gimp. Make sure the file is Grey-scale when creating and when exporting, 
00097                 make sure to select raw image format (.data) and Planar (RRR GGG BBB). Then you can just rename the .data 
00098                 extension to .raw and its all good to go!
00099         */
00100 
00101         /********************Loading of all models at once*******************/
00102         // Create asset
00103         IGameAsset* modelAsset;
00104 
00105         //std::vector<ComputerAI*> m_allAI;
00106         ComputerAI* modelAI;
00107         
00108         // Asset xyz scale and pos
00109         float assetScaleXYZ[3];
00110         float assetPosXYZ[3];
00111 
00112         // Get iterator to start of models map
00113         std::unordered_map<std::string, ModelsData>::iterator itModels = m_allModelsData.begin();
00114 
00115         // Loop through map until all models created
00116         while (itModels != m_allModelsData.end())
00117         {
00118                 // For each different type of model that isn't the player model
00119                 if ((*itModels).first != "player")
00120                 {
00121                         // For each model of same type
00122                         for (int k = 0; k < (*itModels).second.modelPositions.size(); k++)
00123                         {
00124                                 // Get scales
00125                                 for (int j = 0; j < (*itModels).second.modelScales[k].size(); j++)
00126                                 {
00127                                         assetScaleXYZ[j] = (*itModels).second.modelScales[k][j];
00128                                 }
00129 
00130                                 // Get positions
00131                                 for (int j = 0; j < (*itModels).second.modelPositions[k].size(); j++)
00132                                 {
00133                                         assetPosXYZ[j] = (*itModels).second.modelPositions[k][j];
00134                                 }
00135 
00136                                 // Create name asset data and add to asset map
00137                                 modelAsset = m_assetFactory->CreateAsset(ASS_OBJECT, (*itModels).first);
00138                                 modelAsset->LoadFromFilePath((*itModels).second.filePath);
00139                                 modelAsset->AddTexutre(TextureManager::Instance().GetTextureID((*itModels).second.texFilePath), (*itModels).second.texFilePath);
00140                                 modelAsset->SetScale(glm::vec3(assetScaleXYZ[0], assetScaleXYZ[1], assetScaleXYZ[2]));
00141                                 modelAsset->SetPosition(glm::vec3(assetPosXYZ[0], assetPosXYZ[1], assetPosXYZ[2]));
00142 
00143                                 // If AI model, make AI for it
00144                                 if ((*itModels).second.isAI[k])
00145                                 {
00146                                         // Create new computerAI and push to vector storing them
00147                                         modelAI = new ComputerAI(glm::vec3((*itModels).second.modelPositions[k][0], (*itModels).second.modelPositions[k][1], (*itModels).second.modelPositions[k][2]));
00148                                         m_allAI.push_back(modelAI);
00149                                         modelAsset->SetAI(modelAI);
00150                                         std::cout << "Model loaded" << std::endl;
00151                                 }
00152 
00153                                 m_assetFactory->AddAsset(modelAsset);
00154                         }
00155                 }
00156                 // Player model
00157                 else if ((*itModels).first == "player")
00158                 {
00159                         for (int k = 0; k < (*itModels).second.modelPositions.size(); k++)
00160                         {
00161                                 // Get scales
00162                                 for (int j = 0; j < (*itModels).second.modelScales[k].size(); j++)
00163                                 {
00164                                         assetScaleXYZ[j] = (*itModels).second.modelScales[k][j];
00165                                 }
00166 
00167                                 // Get positions
00168                                 for (int j = 0; j < (*itModels).second.modelPositions[k].size(); j++)
00169                                 {
00170                                         assetPosXYZ[j] = (*itModels).second.modelPositions[k][j];
00171                                 }
00172                         }
00173                         // Initialize player model
00174                         player->LoadFromFilePath((*itModels).second.filePath);
00175                         player->SetPosition(glm::vec3(assetPosXYZ[0], assetPosXYZ[1], assetPosXYZ[2]));
00176                         player->SetScale(glm::vec3(assetScaleXYZ[0], assetScaleXYZ[1], assetScaleXYZ[2]));
00177                 }
00178                 // Increment iterator
00179                 itModels++;
00180         }
00181         /********************Loading of all models at once*******************/
00182 
00183         m_windowManager->GetInputManager()->SetPlayer(player);
00184 
00185 
00186         /********************AI Testing*******************/
00187         /*ComputerAI* p = new ComputerAI();
00188         for (int i = 0; i < 1000; i++)
00189         p->Update();
00190         getchar();*/
00191         /********************AI Testing*******************/
00192 
00193         for (int i = 0; i < 15; i++)
00194         {
00195                 int randNum1 = rand() % (6000 - 0 + 1) + 0;
00196                 int randNum2 = rand() % (360 - 1 + 1) + 1;
00197 
00198                 randPositions[i] = randNum1;
00199                 randRotations[i] = randNum2;
00200         }
00201 
00202         // Physics engine initialization
00203         InitializePhysics();
00204 
00205         // Initialize the game world, pass in terrain, assets and physics engine *** Can be reworked *** 
00206         m_gameWorld->SetTerrains(m_terrains);
00207         m_gameWorld->Init(player, m_assetFactory->GetAssets());
00208         m_gameWorld->SetAI(m_allAI);
00209         m_gameWorld->SetPhysicsWorld(m_physicsWorld, m_collisionBodyPos);
00210 }
00211 
00212 void GameControlEngine::GameLoop()
00213 {
00214         while (m_windowManager->ProcessInput(true))
00215         {
00216                 // Use our TimeManager singleton to calculate our framerate every frame
00217                 TimeManager::Instance().CalculateFrameRate(true);
00218 
00219                 glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00220 
00221                 // Update the game world
00222                 m_gameWorld->Update();
00223 
00224                 // Swap buffers
00225                 m_windowManager->SwapTheBuffers();
00226         }
00227 }

00229 float RandomPos()
00230 {
00231         return rand() % (4000 - 0 + 1) + 0;
00232 }

00234 void GameControlEngine::InitializePhysics()
00235 {
00236         // Create camera rigid body to collide with objects
00237         glm::vec3 camerPos(player->GetPosition());
00238         btVector3 bt_cameraPos(camerPos.x, camerPos.y, camerPos.z);
00239         m_physicsWorld->CreatePlayerControlledRigidBody(bt_cameraPos);
00240         m_collisionBodyPos.push_back(bt_cameraPos);
00241 
00242         // Add player (taxi) to the rigid bodies
00243         glm::vec3 playerPos(m_camera->GetPosition());
00244         btVector3 bt_playerPos(playerPos.x, playerPos.y, playerPos.z);
00245         m_collisionBodyPos.push_back(bt_playerPos);
00246 
00247         int i = 1;
00248         int numOfRocks = 10;
00249         int numOfKnights = 20;
00250         // Loop through map and add all assets to the collision body list
00251         std::multimap<std::string, IGameAsset*>::const_iterator itr;
00252         for (itr = m_assetFactory->GetAssets().begin(); itr != m_assetFactory->GetAssets().end(); itr++)
00253         {
00254                 btVector3 randomPos;
00255                 float tempX, tempY, tempZ;
00256 
00257                 if (itr->second->GetAssetName() == "knight")
00258                 {
00259                         for (int j = 0; j < numOfKnights; j++)
00260                         {
00261                                 tempX = itr->second->GetPosition().x + RandomPos();
00262                                 tempZ = itr->second->GetPosition().z + RandomPos();
00263                                 tempY = m_terrains[0]->GetAverageHeight(tempX, tempZ) + 100;
00264 
00265                                 randomPos = btVector3(tempX, tempY, tempZ);
00266                                 
00267                                 m_physicsWorld->CreateStaticRigidBody(randomPos, "knight");
00268                                 m_collisionBodyPos.push_back(randomPos);
00269                         }
00270                 }
00271                 
00272                 if (itr->second->GetAssetName() == "rock")
00273                 {
00274                         
00275                         for (int j = 0; j < numOfRocks; j++)
00276                         {
00277                                 tempX = itr->second->GetPosition().x + RandomPos();
00278                                 tempZ = itr->second->GetPosition().z + RandomPos();
00279                                 tempY = m_terrains[0]->GetAverageHeight(tempX, tempZ) + 100;
00280 
00281                                 randomPos = btVector3(tempX, tempY, tempZ);
00282 
00283                                 m_physicsWorld->CreateStaticRigidBody(randomPos, "rock");
00284                                 m_collisionBodyPos.push_back(randomPos);
00285                         }
00286                 }
00287         }
00288 
00289         //  *** Can this be changed to the terrain mesh? *** 
00290         // Create static rigid body (floor)
00291         //m_physicsWorld->CreateStaticRigidBody();
00292         //m_collisionBodyPos->push_back(btVector3(0.0, 0.0, 0.0));
00293 
00294         // Activate all rigid body objects
00295         m_physicsWorld->ActivateAllObjects();
00296 }

00298 void GameControlEngine::Destroy()
00299 {
00300         // Destroy game world
00301         m_gameWorld->Destroy();
00302 
00303         // Delete window
00304         if (m_windowManager)
00305         {
00306                 m_windowManager->Destroy();
00307 
00308                 delete m_windowManager;
00309                 m_windowManager = nullptr;
00310         }
00311 
00312         // Delete camera
00313         if (m_camera)
00314         {
00315                 delete m_camera;
00316                 m_camera = nullptr;
00317         }
00318 }
